name: Melonhead
description: In the puzzle game "Melonhead" the protagonist Dennis visits his favorite arcade where he plays his favorite game "Melonhead" everyday. However, his school bullies, who are a lot stronger than him, visit the arcade today, as well, so he has to fight himself past them through smart decisions such as pressings buttons, opening trap doors and pushing objects.  He finds funny, nerdy and helpful notes throughout his journey through the arcade which bring Dennis closer to the player. Inspired from 80s arcades, "Melonhead" is set in the 80s, as well.
